longBusinessSummary.0: Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals Limited manufactures and sells refined petroleum products in India. The company produces and sells bitumen, furnace oil, high speed diesel, xylol, naphtha pet coke, sulphur, and motor gasoline, as well as polypropylene and other products. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Mangalore, India. Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals Limited is a subsidiary of Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited.
